title: Improve Polly system prompt and add auto-deploy
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Polly's system prompt has been refined for conciseness and natural tone, alongside a new auto-deployment workflow for faster updates.
gist.impact: Users will experience sharper, more helpful interactions with Polly while developers benefit from streamlined deployment.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot tuning a friendly tiny robot assistant. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'Polly Upgrade'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
